frameDefinitions: A Hunter tries to gain Food by way of outsmarting or tracking a living.
An Object with an understood function is or is not in a state ready to perform that function.
A Device or machine is in (or out of) service.
An Agent manipulates a Sound_maker or a Cause causes the Sound_maker to emit a sound.
A Theme, which may or may not have a default shape or configuration, goes into a particular shape without being made to do so by an agent.
This frame describes food and meal preparation.
frameExamples: In the Congo, he hunted big game for the first time.
The monks would <t>ring</t> the bell until sundown.
It <t>curled</t> up into a cylinder after laying in the sun.
Caitlin <t>baked</t> some cookies from the pre-packaged dough.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Hunter</fen> is the agent hoping to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.
<fen>Food</fen> is the sought-out item by the <fen>Hunter</fen>.
This is the entity to which the <fen>Hunter</fen> pays attention. It is referred to as <fen>Ground</fen> because it serves as the background or context for the <fen>Food</fen>.
When the <fen>Time</fen> seeking action occurs.
The greater geographic location where the <fen>Hunter</fen> attempts to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.
The entity with an understood purpose.
The <fen>Device</fen> or machine that is in or out of operation.
The <fen>Time</fen> when a <fen>Device</fen> is in or out of operation.
The <fen>Place</fen> in which the <fen>Device</fen> is or is not operating.
The individual that manipulates a Sound_maker so that it makes Noise.
The entity that produces the Noise, as a result of the action of the Agent.
The inanimate force of nature that causes the <fen>Sound_maker</fen> to produce noise.
The time at which the noise is produced.
The location at which the sound is produced.
The <fen>Theme</fen> goes into a particular shape.
The <fen>Result</fen> is the shape the <fen>Theme</fen> becomes.
When the changing into a particular shape occurs.
Where the shape-changing event takes place.
The <fen>Cook</fen>  prepares the <fen>Produced_food</fen>.
The <fen>Produced_food</fen> is the result of a <fen>Cook</fen>'s efforts.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the cooking creation occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the cooking creation occurs.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Lights</fex> were on in the primary school
I do n't want to turn round cos the lights are on <fex>at the moment</fex>
Lights were on <fex>on the Kingston road bridge</fex>.
<fex>You</fex> can ring the bell as often as you'd like.
Drew baked an apple pie <fex>at six int he morning</fex>.
Drew prepared the soup <fex> in the kitchen</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: THE BEST OF JAMES COTTON – THE ALLIGATOR RECORDS YEARS
Baby, Don't You Tear My Clothes
The 35th Anniversary Jam of The James Cotton Blues Band
“The Blues Had a Baby and They Called It Rock and Roll
the last half of the 60's decade
